forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 48. West southwest wind 5 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 57 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 3 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
As evening descends upon Downtown San Francisco, the skies present a gentle canvas of parting clouds, hinting at the night’s cool embrace. With temperatures dipping to a crisp 48 degrees and a brisk west-southwest wind stirring through at 5 to 16 mph, the air carries a refreshing chill, reminiscent of salt from the sea. The transition from day to twilight reveals the city’s silhouette against a backdrop of subtle hues while the Golden Gate Bridge stands sentinel, partly shrouded but defiantly visible. The evening’s clarity is marred only slightly by the lingering marine layer, a soft veil that whispers across the bay, but it is not so pervasive as to obscure the sparkle of distant city lights.

Tomorrow promises a radiant greeting as sunny skies emerge, elevating the day’s mood and temperature to a pleasant 60 degrees. As the sun climbs, the air will remain refreshing, conducive to leisurely strolls through the city’s vibrant neighborhoods. Dress in layers, favoring a light jacket against the morning chill, casting it aside as the warmth envelops you by midday. Consider exploring the local street art scene or finding a cozy café where you can sip your brew whilst watching the world unfurl. Embrace the charm of this mercurial city, where each moment beckons with its own unique allure.
